title: Games industry M & A transactions cumulative value worldwide 2010 to 2016
summary: The statistic shows the Value of the million economic U.S. of M and & to the gross domestic product ( dollars ) in Games industry M A from 2010 to 2016 .
In 2015 , the Value of the million U.S. of M and & was at 7757.4 million .
gold: This statistic shows the Cumulative value of games market mergers and acquisitions ( M & A ) worldwide from 2010 to 2016.
In 2015 , based on the values of disclosed transactions , the industry 's M & A deals amounted to 4.36 billion U.S. dollars .
